procedure.instructions: VP chicken
In Salad bag, place 114g power mix.
In 2 oz garnish cup, place 40g Sweet Sesame Dressing.
In 2 oz garnish cup, place 44g Mandarin Orange Segments.
In 1 oz garnish cup, place 10g Peanuts.
In 1 oz garnish cup, place 2.5g Tovala Togarashi.

procedure.instructions: In Tray 1, place 146g Salmon Filet and seal in MAP machine. Put in blast freezer.
In Tray 2, place 175g mexican cauliflower rice. Seal with MAP machine with gas.
In 2 oz container, place 36g Garlic Lime Sauce.
In 2 oz container, place 40g Jalapeno Mayo.
In a 1 oz container place 8g corn nut crumble.

parts.title: Chicken Gumbo Base - SA
parts.mealPartTitle: Andouille Sausage + Chicken Gumbo and Rice
parts.apiMealTitle: Andouille Sausage + Chicken Gumbo and Rice
parts.shortTitle: Andouille Sausage + Chicken Gumbo and Rice

procedure.instructions: Note: reserve some water to blend with the roux before adding roux to the mixture.
Heat oil.
Saute celery, peppers, onions and garlic until soft.
Add seasoning, dried scallions, chicken base and water. Bring to simmer.
Whisk in red roux slurry (see note above) and simmer until smooth and slightly thickened.
Cool.
Record weight, label and store in cooler until needed.

parts.title: Alfredo Sauce - SA
parts.mealPartTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach
parts.apiMealTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach
parts.shortTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach

procedure.instructions: In a large steam kettle add milk and spices, bring up to a simmer (target: 145-180°F)
Start stick blending and add in the roux in batches.
Add the cheese after the roux have dissolved and thickened the sauce.
After the cheese has been fully incorporated, turn off heat.
Record weight, label and store in cooler until needed.

parts.apiMealTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach
parts.shortTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach

procedure.instructions: Add butter to pot.
Heat over medium until melted.
Whisk in 1/3 of flour until no dry flour is remaining.
Repeat 3 until all flour is used.
Remove from heat once mixture shows bubbles.
Pour into sheet trays.
Record weight, label, and store in cooler until needed

parts.title: Defrosted Spinach - Spun - SA
parts.mealPartTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach
parts.apiMealTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach
parts.shortTitle: Garlic Pepper Steak with Caramelized Onions + Creamed Spinach

procedure.instructions: Remove spinach from freezer, lay out on perforated hotel pans in walk in overnight (at least 8 hours)
Load thawed spinach 1/2 way up into salad spinner.
Run for 1 minute.
Remove batch and repeat steps 2-3 until all spinach are used.
Record weight, label, and store in cooler until needed

Open cans.
Empty cans of sauce into barrel.

02f6bf34-c239-4d3e-80c2-8794b6e44c7c.title: Steamed Garlic Cloves - SA
02f6bf34-c239-4d3e-80c2-8794b6e44c7c.mealPartTitle: BBQ Chicken + Garlic Mashed Potatoes with Broccoli

02f6bf34-c239-4d3e-80c2-8794b6e44c7c.shortTitle: BBQ Chicken + Garlic Mashed Potatoes with Broccoli

procedure.instructions: Empty 2 bags of garlic (10 lbs) onto a perforated sheet tray.
Preheat oven using STMD GARLIC 4100.
Remove from oven, transfer to speed rack to cook completety.
Record weight, label and store in cooler until needed.
Combine all ingredients in a container.
Mix well until spices are dispersed.
Record weight, label and store in a cool dry place until needed.
Mix again before portioning.

03c733af-e51a-4d8c-ba9f-20e487e9886c.title: Brown Sugar Cinnamon Mix for Apple Compote

procedure.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a container.
Mix well until cinnamon is dispersed.
Record weight, label and store in a cool dry place until needed.
Mix again before portioning.

procedure.instructions: Add all ingredients to container.
Mix until combined.
Record weight, label, and store in cooler until needed.
Mix again before portioning.
Add onions to container.
Add all ingredients EXCEPT onions to pot.
Heat pot until bubbles reach surface.
Remove pot from heat.
Pour hot liquid on onions.
Chill, record weight, label, and store in cooler until needed.
